## SuggestIgnoreParams interface

A parameter builder interface describing the ignore methods available to the [Suggester](./prosemirror-suggest.suggester.md) handlers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SuggestIgnoreParams 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addIgnored(params)](./prosemirror-suggest.suggestignoreparams.addignored.md) | Add a match target to the ignored matches. |
|  [clearIgnored(name)](./prosemirror-suggest.suggestignoreparams.clearignored.md) | When name is provided remove all ignored decorations which match the named suggester. Otherwise remove \*\*all\*\* ignored decorations from the document. |
